documentation.text: @notice Initial donation from all the organizers, when all the organizers donated, the contract state is updated to DONATION

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct IterableAddressMapping.KeyFlag storage ref[] storage ref

documentation.text: @notice it the campaign timer is over from more than 5 minutes, set the camapign state to to ENDED and allow the beneficiary to obtain his part of reward

@notice Set a new milestone to the milestone contract. 
 the amount given in input to this method is forwarded to the milestone contract and used as a reward.
@dev check if the milestone is reached and ask to the external contract
@notice used by the milestone contract to pay the reward. after the reward is received the expire date of the contract is updated
@notice setup a new reward for who donate more than a certain value. who reaches the flag take the donated cash. If no one does, the beneficiaries take it.

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct AscendingOrderedStack.Elem storage ref[] storage ref

documentation.text: @dev check if the amount donated unlock some flags, if it does, reward the good boy.

@notice destroy the contract and give the remaining change (due to decimal divisions errors) to the organizer that invoked the method as a reward.
         is possible to call this method only after all the beneficiaries withdrawn their funds

events
@notice allow the campaign contract to setup a new milestone, the new milestone must be setted up at a bigger amount than the last one setted
@notice allow the campaign contract to withdraw an amount of money in case a milestone is reached
@notice used by the main contract to inform the milestone contract that the campaign is expired
@notice after the campaign is ended, this method allows the organizer to get a refund of the unreached milestones
@notice destroy the contract

documentation.text:
@notice used from a donator that wants to get the log of the donated amount

events
@notice allow the campaign contract to setup a new milestone, the new milestone must be setted up at a bigger amount than the last one setted
@notice allow the campaign contract to withdraw an amount of money in case a milestone is reached
@notice used by the main contract to inform the milestone contract that the campaign is expired
@notice after the campaign is ended, this method allows the organizer to get a refund of the unreached milestones
@notice destroy the contract

campaign_ended().notice: used by the main contract to inform the milestone contract that the campaign is expired

refund(uint256).notice: after the campaign is ended, this method allows the organizer to get a refund of the unreached milestones

set_milestone(uint256,address).notice: allow the campaign contract to setup a new milestone, the new milestone must be setted up at a bigger amount than the last one setted

withdraw().notice: allow the campaign contract to withdraw an amount of money in case a milestone is reached

userdoc.notice: This contract can be used for the milestone system of a CrowdFundingCampaign.  Once initialized this contract await for the calls of the Crowdfundingcampaign contract in order to setup or send the reward for the milestones. When the campaign is over is possible for the organizer who setted up the milestone to obtain a refund.
